lead_paragraph: Frantisek Kaberle, who scored the Stanley Cup-winning goal for the Carolina Hurricanes last season, had shoulder surgery yesterday and could miss four to six months. Jim Rutherford, the Hurricanes’ general manager, said he did not know which shoulder was injured.
